TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITrackingPersonalizable

summary.span: 允许 Web 部件控件跟踪个性化加载和保存过程的特定阶段。

span.span: Allows Web Parts controls to track the specific phases of the personalization load and save process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口允许控件开发人员跟踪个性化设置生命周期的不同阶段，包括个性化数据的加载和保存。This interface allows control developers to track different phases of the personalization life cycle, including the loading and saving of personalization data. 在大多数情况下，若要使用此接口，您需要创建一个自定义 或 并实现此接口。In most cases, to use this interface you would create a custom or and implement this interface. 此外，需要管理自己的更改（"更新"）跟踪的控件应实现此接口。Additionally, controls that need to manage their own change ("dirty") tracking should implement this interface. 管理自己的更改跟踪的控件应 `true` 从属性返回 。Controls that manage their own change tracking should return `true` from the property. 如果 `false` 返回，则 ASP.NET 负责通过将加载的属性信息与保存的属性信息进行比较来确定更改。If `false` is returned, then ASP.NET is responsible for determining changes by comparing the property information loaded with the property information that was saved. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法和属性来跟踪个性化设置信息的加载和保存。The following code example demonstrates using methods and properties to track the loading and saving of personalization information. 该示例由两部分组成： .aspx 页面和应放置在 App_Code 子目录中的文件。The example consists of two parts, an .aspx page and a file that should be placed in an App_Code subdirectory. 下面的代码示例创建一个 Web 部件控件，该控件允许用户输入 URL 信息并为用户保存此信息。The following code example creates a Web Parts control that allows a user to enter URL information and saves this information for the user. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/CS/persdict.cs#9)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/VB/persdict.vb#9)] 以下 .aspx 页面创建 Web 部件区域，并将该控件添加到区域。The following .aspx page creates a Web Parts zone and adds the control to the zone. 该页还引用了一个登录控件，你应该使用该控件登录各个用户，以便可以应用个性化设置。The page also references a login control that you should use to log on individual users so that personalization can be applied. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/CS/defaultcs.aspx#10)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/VB/Defaultvb.aspx#10)]

related.span: 演练：使用用户控件实现 Web 部件个性化设置

span.span: Walkthrough: Implementing Web Parts Personalization with a User Control

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void BeginLoad() cil managed

summary.span: 表示个性化信息加载阶段开始。

span.span: Represents the beginning of the load phase for personalization information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件控件集在应用个性化设置数据之前调用此方法。The Web Parts control set calls this method prior to applying personalization data. 跟踪其自己的更改状态的控件应使用此方法设置一个内部标志，指示属性不应调用 。A control that tracks its own change state should use this method to set an internal flag indicating that properties should not call . 这是因为，属性设置方法可在应用个性化数据的过程中调用，然后调用 。This is because property-setting methods can be called during the application of personalization data, subsequent to the call to . 在大多数情况下，不应将控件视为已更改（"更新"），只是因为它的可个性化属性是根据从基础数据存储区加载的数据设置的。In most scenarios, a control should not be considered changed ("dirty") just because its personalizable properties have been set based on data loaded from the underlying data store. > [!NOTE] > 导入 Web 部件控件后，如果应用了个性化数据，也会调用此方法。This method is also called when personalization data is applied after importing a Web Parts control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates using the method. 有关由控件和 .aspx 页组成的完整工作代码示例，请参阅 类概述主题。For a complete, working code example that consists of a control and an .aspx page, see the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/CS/persdict.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/VB/persdict.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void BeginSave() cil managed

summary.span: 表示从控件提取个性化数据之前的阶段。

span.span: Represents the phase prior to extracting personalization data from a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件控件集在从控件提取个性化设置数据之前调用此方法。The Web Parts control set calls this method prior to extracting personalization data from the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates using the method. 有关由控件和 .aspx 页组成的完整工作代码示例，请参阅 类概述主题。For a complete, working code example that consists of a control and an .aspx page, see the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/CS/persdict.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/VB/persdict.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void EndLoad() cil managed

summary.span: 表示已经将个性化数据应用于控件之后的阶段。

span.span: Represents the phase after personalization data has been applied to a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件控件集在将个性化设置数据应用于控件后调用此方法。The Web Parts control set calls this method after personalization data has been applied to the control. 跟踪其更改状态的控件应使用此方法来重置其内部状态，以指示后面的属性设置方法应调用 。A control that tracks its change state should use this method to reset its internal state to indicate that subsequent property-setting methods should call . 调用方法时，Web 部件控件集已完成对控件的个性化设置数据的任何应用。By the time the method is called, the Web Parts control set has completed any application of personalization data to the control. 因此，对控件状态的后续更改应被视为有效指示器，控件已更改（"更新"）。As a result, subsequent changes to the control's state should be considered valid indicators that the control has changed (is "dirty"). > [!NOTE] > 导入 Web 部件控件后，如果应用了个性化数据，也会调用此方法。This method is also called when personalization data is applied after importing a Web Parts control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates using the method. 有关由控件和 .aspx 页组成的完整工作代码示例，请参阅 类概述主题。For a complete, working code example that consists of a control and an .aspx page, see the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/CS/persdict.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/VB/persdict.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void EndSave() cil managed

summary.span: 表示已经从控件提取个性化数据之后的阶段。

span.span: Represents the phase after personalization data has been extracted from a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件控件集在从控件提取个性化数据后调用此方法。The Web Parts control set calls this method after personalization data has been extracted from the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates using the method. 有关由控件和 .aspx 页组成的完整工作代码示例，请参阅 类概述主题。For a complete, working code example that consists of a control and an .aspx page, see the class overview topic. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TracksChanges As Boolean
public: property bool TracksChanges { bool get(); };

summary.span: 指示控件是否跟踪其更改的状态。

span.span: Indicates whether the control tracks the status of its changes.

value.span: 如果要 Web 部件控件负责确定何时控件被视为已更改（“更新”），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the Web Parts control is responsible for determining when the control is considered changed ("dirty"); otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件 `true` 从此属性返回，则 Web 部件控件负责确定何时将其视为 "脏"。If a control returns `true` from this property, then it is the Web Parts control's responsibility to determine when it considers itself "dirty." 如果控件确定它已更改（即 "更新"），则该控件必须自行调用 。If a control determines that it has changed (is "dirty"), that control must call on itself. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 属性。The following code example demonstrates setting the property. 有关由控件和 .aspx 页组成的完整工作代码示例，请参阅 类概述主题。For a complete, working code example that consists of a control and an .aspx page, see the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/CS/persdict.cs#8)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/VB/persdict.vb#8)]
